option.name: originalContent
option.value:
FROM python:3.10-slim
WORKDIR /app
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \ build-essential \ ffmpeg \ libsndfile1 \ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
COPY requirements.txt . RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip \ && pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . .
ENV PYTHONPATH="/app/midas_repo:/app"
EXPOSE 8082
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8082"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
FROM python:3.10-slim
WORKDIR /app
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \ build-essential \ ffmpeg \ libsndfile1 \ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
COPY requirements.txt . RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip \ && pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . .
ENV PYTHONPATH="/app"
EXPOSE 8082
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8082"]
